trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Altoona
There were no other sightings in Altoona on or around November 30th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsI was riding in the car with my parents, and i looked up a saw a very bright star.I saw it move in one direction(North),which was the way our car was driving.I simply dismissed it, and thought i saw it move through the car window, becuase we were driving that way.But when I got home I went to my backporch(which was West), and looked for the object. I found the object in the sky.I watched it for 30 minutes.All it really did was moved around very swiftly.Then it spun around in a circle very fastly.Then it accelerated to a point at which it made one strip of light and disapeared.
Summary: It was a very big star-like craft, that was very, very bright.
